verses.verse: ( The Presence of the LORD) ( 510 2:14-36 ) מִכְתָּ֥ם <WH4387> miḵ·tām A Miktam ( Miktam is probably a musical or liturgical term; used for and .) לְדָוִ֑ד <WH1732> lə·ḏā·wiḏ of David. שָֽׁמְרֵ֥נִי <WH8104> šā·mə·rê·nî Preserve me, אֵ֝֗ל <WH410> ’êl O God, כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- for חָסִ֥יתִי <WH2620> ḥā·sî·ṯî I take refuge. בָֽךְ׃ Prep│2ms ( ḇāḵ) in You

אָמַ֣רְתְּ <WH559> ’ā·mart I said לַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD, אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> ’ă·ḏō·nāy are my Lord; אָ֑תָּה <WH859> ’āt·tāh “ You ט֝וֹבָתִ֗י <WH2896> ṭō·w·ḇā·ṯî good thing. ” בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- I have no עָלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5921> ‘ā·le·ḵā apart from You

לִ֭קְדוֹשִׁים <WH6918> liq·ḏō·wō·šîm As for the saints אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- - בָּאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> bā·’ā·reṣ in the land, הֵ֑מָּה <WH1992> hêm·māh they וְ֝אַדִּירֵ֗י <WH117> wə·’ad·dî·rê are the excellence כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- in whom all חֶפְצִי־ <WH2656> ḥep̄·ṣî- my delight בָֽם׃ Prep│3mp ( ḇām) resides.

יִרְבּ֥וּ <WH7235> yir·bū will multiply עַצְּבוֹתָם֮ <WH6094> ‘aṣ·ṣə·ḇō·w·ṯām Sorrows אַחֵ֪ר <WH312> ’a·ḥêr other gods. מָ֫הָ֥רוּ <WH4116> mā·hā·rū to those who chase בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- I will not אַסִּ֣יךְ <WH5258> ’as·sîḵ pour out נִסְכֵּיהֶ֣ם <WH5262> nis·kê·hem their libations מִדָּ֑ם <WH1818> mid·dām of blood, וּֽבַל־ <WH1077> ū·ḇal- or אֶשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> ’eś·śā speak אֶת־ <WH853> ’e·ṯōš- - שְׁ֝מוֹתָ֗ם <WH8034> mō·w·ṯām their names עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- with שְׂפָתָֽי׃ <WH8193> śə·p̄ā·ṯāy my lips.

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD מְנָת־ <WH4490> mə·nāṯ- [is] my chosen portion חֶלְקִ֥י <WH2506> ḥel·qî ... וְכוֹסִ֑י <WH3563> wə·ḵō·w·sî and my cup; אַ֝תָּ֗ה <WH859> ’at·tāh You תּוֹמִ֥יךְ <WH8551> tō·w·mîḵ have made גּוֹרָלִֽי׃ <WH1486> gō·w·rā·lî my lot  secure .

חֲבָלִ֣ים <WH2256> ḥă·ḇā·lîm The lines נָֽפְלוּ־ <WH5307> nā·p̄ə·lū- have fallen לִ֭י Prep│1cs ( lî) of my  boundary בַּנְּעִמִ֑ים 5273 Prep-b, Art│Adj-mp ( ban·nə·‘i·mîm) in pleasant places; אַף־ 637 Conj ( ’ap̄-) surely נַ֝חֲלָ֗ת 5159 N-fsc ( na·ḥă·lāṯ) inheritance שָֽׁפְרָ֥ה 8231 V-Qal-Perf-3fs ( šā·p̄ə·rāh) is delightful. עָלָֽי׃ 5921 Prep│1cs ( ‘ā·lāy) my

אֲבָרֵ֗ךְ <WH1288> ’ă·ḇā·rêḵ I will bless אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer who יְעָצָ֑נִי <WH3289> yə·‘ā·ṣā·nî counsels me; אַף־ <WH637> ’ap̄- even לֵ֝יל֗וֹת <WH3915> lê·lō·wṯ at night יִסְּר֥וּנִי <WH3256> yis·sə·rū·nî instructs me. ( Or my heart instructs me; Hebrew my kidneys instruct me) כִלְיוֹתָֽי׃ <WH3629> ḵil·yō·w·ṯāy my conscience

שִׁוִּ֬יתִי <WH7737> šiw·wî·ṯî I have set ( LXX I foresaw) יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD לְנֶגְדִּ֣י <WH5048> lə·neḡ·dî before me. תָמִ֑יד <WH8548> ṯā·mîḏ always כִּ֥י <WH3588> kî Because מִֽ֝ימִינִ֗י <WH3225> mî·mî·nî He is at my right hand, בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- I will not אֶמּֽוֹט׃ <WH4131> ’em·mō·wṭ be shaken.

לָכֵ֤ן׀ <WH3651> lā·ḵên Therefore שָׂמַ֣ח <WH8055> śā·maḥ is glad לִ֭בִּי <WH3820> lib·bî my heart וַיָּ֣גֶל <WH1523> way·yā·ḡel rejoices; כְּבוֹדִ֑י <WH3519> kə·ḇō·w·ḏî and my tongue אַף־ <WH637> ’ap̄- also בְּ֝שָׂרִ֗י <WH1320> bə·śā·rî my body יִשְׁכֹּ֥ן <WH7931> yiš·kōn will dwell לָבֶֽטַח׃ <WH983> lā·ḇe·ṭaḥ securely. ( LXX will dwell in hope)

כִּ֤י׀ <WH3588> kî For לֹא־ <WH3808> lō- You will not תַעֲזֹ֣ב <WH5800> ṯa·‘ă·zōḇ abandon נַפְשִׁ֣י <WH5315> nap̄·šî my soul לִשְׁא֑וֹל <WH7585> liš·’ō·wl to Sheol, לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lō- nor will You תִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> ṯit·tên let חֲ֝סִידְךָ֗ <WH2623> ḥă·sî·ḏə·ḵā Your Holy One לִרְא֥וֹת <WH7200> lir·’ō·wṯ see שָֽׁחַת׃ <WH7845> šå̄·ḥaṯ decay. ( Cited in )

תּֽוֹדִיעֵנִי֮ <WH3045> tō·w·ḏî·‘ê·nî You have made known to me אֹ֤רַח <WH734> ’ō·raḥ the path חַ֫יִּ֥ים <WH2416> ḥay·yîm of life; שֹׂ֣בַע <WH7648> śō·ḇa‘ You will fill me שְׂ֭מָחוֹת <WH8057> mā·ḥō·wṯ with joy אֶת־ <WH854> ’eṯ- ..., ( Cited in ) פָּנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> pā·ne·ḵā in Your presence נְעִמ֖וֹת <WH5273> nə·‘i·mō·wṯ pleasures בִּימִינְךָ֣ <WH3225> bî·mî·nə·ḵā at Your right hand. נֶֽצַח׃ <WH5331> ne·ṣaḥ with eternal
